title: Game starts at ~60-100 fps but goes down to under 10
body:
https://i.snag.gy/EthrKP.jpg
This started today randomly, i havent downloaded anything except pictures in the last week or two
What I tried (and had 0 effect):
Rebooting computer twice
Changing from graphics from all the way to the left to all the way to the right (very low --> very high q settings)
Using different accounts
Waiting a few hours 
https://i.snag.gy/NzoHQ8.jpg

replies.body: There could be some game assets not rendering the game properly, which can see frame drops like this.  You've taken some solid steps, but I also recommend going over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your pc is in good shape.  You might also need to grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and force a repatch to fix up any bad files.  Test it in a custom and let me know if it helps!
